issues.description: The getter for the `name` field in `StockIngredient` is named `getIngredientName()` in the template repository but renamed to `getName()` in the solution repository. This inconsistent naming for the same conceptual field can confuse students when mapping the UMLâ€™s `name` attribute to the implemented getter and when using `Stock.findStockIngredient()` which relies on that getter.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the getter name for `StockIngredient.name` across template and solution by renaming `getIngredientName()` to `getName()` in the template and updating all calls (e.g., in `Stock.findStockIngredient`) to use `getName()`.
